name: Trumpty Dumpty Wall
description:
Arcade style brick stacking game for Windows PC ~ FREE with no ads.

There is a brick platform at the bottom of the screen. Try to stack as many bricks as you can on top of the brick platform. Tap your mouse (or tap the space bar) to release a brick. You have to time it right. How many can you stack before one brick falls off? Take turns with friends. Top score of the evening wins, (and doesn't have to pay for drinks that night.)

No matter what side of the fence you stand on, regardless if you are for or against the wall, you can enjoy this casual arcade style game. One group can help build the wall, while the other laughs it up because of how silly it all looks. For once we have a non partisan win/win that anyone can enjoy.

Make America Great Again - VOTE TRUMP 2024!
